message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,500.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $10,500 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you be willing to consider $11,000?  This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'd be very happy with the product.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
